name: mern-chat-app-main
description: This is a simple web chat application. This application allows private chatting between two logged-in users. The technologies, software, database and libraries used to create this app are:   1. NodeJS   2. React   3. SocketIo   4. MongoDB   5. Express   6. Bcrypt   7. Validator   8. cors   9. React-router-dom   10. React-bootstrap   11. Moment   12. react-input-emoji   13. JWT   14. dotenv
